properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 4:46AM EST until January 11 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of up to two inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth
of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Berrien and Cass MI Counties.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 11 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult with snow and ice
covered roads tonight. Scattered power outages are possible with
gusty winds and ice accumulations. The evening commute will be
difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to freezing rain and then
to snow tonight with a period of sleet possible.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM EST THIS EVENING
